wf_workflow_version.name: wf_getTenableReportStatus
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

sys_variable_value.value:
workflow.scratchpad.currentReportStatus = data.get(10).launchResult.status;
gs.info('Checking Report ID ' + data.get(10).launchResult.reportId + ' returned a status of ' + data.get(10).launchResult.status);

workflow.scratchpad.currentReportStatus = data.get(10).launchResult.status;
gs.info('Checking Report ID ' + data.get(10).launchResult.reportId + ' returned a status of ' + data.get(10).launchResult.status);

current.u_scan_status = 'Fetch report';
gs.info('Report ID ' + data.get(10).launchResult.reportId + ' Reported Finished now Exiting');

current.u_scan_status = 'Fetch report';
gs.info('Report ID ' + data.get(10).launchResult.reportId + ' Reported Finished now Exiting');

wf_activity.name: Wait For configured amount of time then try again

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = workflow.scratchpad.waitTime;
